FMLInterModComms Simple intermod communications to receive simple messages directed at you from other mods
FMLInterModComms.IMCEvent Subscribe to this event to receive your messages (they are sent between Mod.Init and Mod.PostInit)
FMLInterModComms.IMCMessage You will receive an instance of this for each message sent
